wasmer/entities/function/env/
mod.rs

1pub(crate) mod inner;
2pub(crate) use inner::*;
3
4use crate::{AsStoreMut, AsStoreRef, StoreMut, StoreRef, macros::backend::match_rt};
5use std::{any::Any, fmt::Debug, marker::PhantomData};
6
7#[derive(Debug, derive_more::From)]
8/// An opaque reference to a function environment.
9/// The function environment data is owned by the `Store`.
10pub struct FunctionEnv<T>(pub(crate) BackendFunctionEnv<T>);
11
12impl<T> Clone for FunctionEnv<T> {
13    fn clone(&self) -> Self {
14        Self(self.0.clone())
15    }
16}
17
18impl<T> FunctionEnv<T> {
19    /// Make a new FunctionEnv
20    pub fn new(store: &mut impl AsStoreMut, value: T) -> Self
21    where
22        T: Any + Send + 'static + Sized,
23    {
24        Self(BackendFunctionEnv::new(store, value))
25    }
26
27    //#[allow(dead_code)] // This function is only used in js
28    //pub(crate) fn from_handle(handle: StoreHandle<VMFunctionEnvironment>) -> Self {
29    //    todo!()
30    //}
31
32    /// Get the data as reference
33    pub fn as_ref<'a>(&self, store: &'a impl AsStoreRef) -> &'a T
34    where
35        T: Any + Send + 'static + Sized,
36    {
37        self.0.as_ref(store)
38    }
39
40    /// Get the data as mutable
41    pub fn as_mut<'a>(&self, store: &'a mut impl AsStoreMut) -> &'a mut T
42    where
43        T: Any + Send + 'static + Sized,
44    {
45        self.0.as_mut(store)
46    }
47
48    /// Convert it into a `FunctionEnvMut`
49    pub fn into_mut(self, store: &mut impl AsStoreMut) -> FunctionEnvMut<'_, T>
50    where
51        T: Any + Send + 'static + Sized,
52    {
53        self.0.into_mut(store)
54    }
55}
56
57/// A temporary handle to a [`FunctionEnv`].
58#[derive(derive_more::From)]
59pub struct FunctionEnvMut<'a, T: 'a>(pub(crate) BackendFunctionEnvMut<'a, T>);
60
61impl<T: Send + 'static> FunctionEnvMut<'_, T> {
62    /// Returns a reference to the host state in this function environement.
63    pub fn data(&self) -> &T {
64        self.0.data()
65    }
66
67    /// Returns a mutable- reference to the host state in this function environement.
68    pub fn data_mut(&mut self) -> &mut T {
69        self.0.data_mut()
70    }
71
72    /// Borrows a new immmutable reference
73    pub fn as_ref(&self) -> FunctionEnv<T> {
74        self.0.as_ref()
75    }
76
77    /// Borrows a new mutable reference
78    pub fn as_mut(&mut self) -> FunctionEnvMut<'_, T> {
79        self.0.as_mut()
80    }
81
82    /// Borrows a new mutable reference of both the attached Store and host state
83    pub fn data_and_store_mut(&mut self) -> (&mut T, StoreMut<'_>) {
84        self.0.data_and_store_mut()
85    }
86}
87
88impl<T> AsStoreRef for FunctionEnvMut<'_, T> {
89    fn as_store_ref(&self) -> StoreRef<'_> {
90        self.0.as_store_ref()
91    }
92}
93
94impl<T> AsStoreMut for FunctionEnvMut<'_, T> {
95    fn as_store_mut(&mut self) -> StoreMut<'_> {
96        self.0.as_store_mut()
97    }
98
99    fn objects_mut(&mut self) -> &mut crate::StoreObjects {
100        self.0.objects_mut()
101    }
102}
103
104impl<T> std::fmt::Debug for FunctionEnvMut<'_, T>
105where
106    T: Send + std::fmt::Debug + 'static,
107{
108    fn fmt(&self, f: &mut std::fmt::Formatter<'_>) -> std::fmt::Result {
109        self.0.fmt(f)
110    }
111}
